Informant consensus factor (FIC): Another commonly used index for exploring potentially active medicinal plants for certain ailments, FIC was first proposed and used in medicinal ethnobotany studies to estimate the agreement of participants on a number of plant species according to specific use-categories (illnesses or ailments) [ 62].
